001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
004import java.util.Objects;
005
006/**
007 * Logging about logging. Currently not really public API.
008 *
009 * @author agentgt
010 * @hidden
011 */
012public interface MetaLog {
013
014        /**
015         * Logs an error in the logging system.
016         * @param event event to log.
017         */
018        public static void error(LogEvent event) {
019                FailsafeAppender.INSTANCE.append(event);
020        }
021
022        /**
023         * Logs an error in the logging system.
024         * @param loggerName derived from class.
025         * @param throwable error to log.
026         */
027        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, Throwable throwable) {
028                String m = Objects.requireNonNullElse(throwable.getMessage(), "exception");
029                error(loggerName, m, throwable);
030        }
031
032        /**
033         * Logs an error in the logging system.
034         * @param loggerName derived from class.
035         * @param message error message.
036         * @param throwable error to log.
037         */
038        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, String message, Throwable throwable) {
039                var event = LogEvent.of(Level.ERROR, loggerName.getName(), message, throwable);
040                error(event);
041        }
042
043}
